text: Mba guma buni nzua vov, wom khaŋ nzuai, “Ndu buni thari khergip, Firaderfia ŋgu bakɨmen ki sios gari enser ndi mbarari. Mba buni khaŋ muuŋgi, ‘Gu mba guigira Fhe Bakɨme nɨman ŋgarav, ana vuzvuga zɨn vov, ana ŋaara mbui guma ma. Gu ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan Devitan kii suirigi, gu fhɨrgirga bigɨn, guma the ana mpɨrarga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Gu vhɨra mpɨrarga bigɨn, guma the ana fhɨrgirga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Gu kha kameŋ khergiap, nde ndi mbai.
